options.text: This template will deploy a new ERP baseline implementation.  It require a user managed identity with RBAC access to Power Platform.
The setup requires an existing User Assigned Identity that has been granted RBAC to the Power Platform to complete the deployment.

elements.name: finOpsIdentity
elements.label: Select an existing User Assigned Identity with permissions to the Power Platform APIs

options.text: The setup requires an existing Azure subscription to provision the required infrastructure and components, both in Azure and in Power Platform. Select a subscription and a region where the deployment should be placed, and also specify if you want to use this subscription for all Azure services and required configuration.

elements.name: subscriptionId
elements.label: Subscription
elements.toolTip: Select the Subscription for the deployment.

elements.name: locationName
elements.label: Location
elements.toolTip: Select the Location for the deployment.

elements.name: subOption
elements.label: Use this subscription for all Azure services and configuration
elements.toolTip: If 'Yes' is selected, the setup will configure this setting.

options.text: Determine number and type of environments required

validations.message: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-18 characters long.
Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.
